pages.text: If Seasons is enabled, Pigs take 6 season months to mature.

Pigs require $(li)Water $(li)Food $(li)Straw(optional) $(br2)If pigs are missing water and food, they will eventually die.$(br2)Feed: $(li)Wheat $(li)Barley $(li)Corn $(li)Soybean $(li)Canola $(li)Potato $(li)Sugarbeets $(br2)Pigs also drop Manure, which can be used as fertilizer for crops! Potentially increasing yield by 300%. Manure drop is doubled if pigs are given straw.
